website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its wealth of features that include a night mode, UV-C filter, and an auto timer.
pros: 2-in-1 filtering system with a pre-filter, activated carbon filter, and a true HEPA filter
Also features a UV-C light to destroy germs and bacteria
2 speed settings, as well as a night mode
cons: Some feel that the airflow from this model is weak
UV-C light is difficult to replace when it burns out

customer_reviews.title: Makes an awful noise
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for around six months and it’s started making weird noises so I changed the filter and it’s still doing it. Don’t know why. Super annoying and loud. I don’t even want to use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Caused electrical
customer_reviews.text: It was working great. Caught a lot of stuff in the filter and was helping my son breathe better (severe allergies) HOWEVER- after having this for about a month and running 24/7, I came home today to an electrical burning smell. The unit was smoking from the top and sparking! Of course this happens right after it can’t be returned to amazon. And no one will help me. This could have caused a fire!!
customer_reviews.author: aza P

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a for a 14x14 room. Design is very cool and elegant, but no noticeable difference at all
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with my allergies
customer_reviews.text: This purifier did not help my allergies. I still had a runny nose and sneezing after a couple of months. Also after dusting I still had the same amount of dust in my bedroom after a few days as I did before the purfier. Still have to dust every few days. Also when I check the pre-filter to clean it, it barely has any dust on it. So either I received a defective unit or these purifiers just don't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: NICE PURIFIER!
customer_reviews.text: This purifying system is quiet, efficient, has easy portabiility, nice aesthetic design, intuitive operation, a high quality build and an outstanding price point. Most importantly--it WORKS! My wife and I suffer from outdoor/indoor allergies and after the first day of use our symptoms have vanished! I am an asthmatic with night time cough and wheezing and have found that the PURE has taken away my cough and reduced my wheezing nearly 80%! This product has exceeded our expectations! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more disappointed. Every other air purifier I have ever owned has lasted more than 10 years. This one didn't even make it to one year. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: hopeful9

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a good product. However, after one month of using this product my electricity bill more than doubled. The slight reduction in dust was absolutely not worth the cost of this product. I would never recommend this product to anyone. Also, the company who made the product promised a new filter, which I never received.
customer_reviews.author: Ptolemy Schwarzenegger III

customer_reviews.title: Set it on a tabletop for best results
customer_reviews.text: I'm cautiously optimistic. I've had this for a couple of weeks and was considering sending it back because it didn't seem to be doing anything. I constantly felt little particles float against my face. Yesterday I decided to set it up on a table, and it instantly started working better. I ran it for a few hours and today no more dust particles in the air. I think it's just too small to function well from floor level, but hoisted up it seems to be doing a very good job. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: Died
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 weeks of use. Will not turn on anymore. What a waste of money. I will ask for a refund and return this useless item back to them. Let's see how well their customer service pleases
customer_reviews.author: Marie R

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these for almost exactly one year. They work great and make the air easier to breathe and were not super loud. However, about 6 months into owning it, one of my unit's fans started sounding awful and it was very loud and annoying, even at low speeds, making it unbearable. The other, however is working fine. I am just frustrated that the unit is basically unusable after just one year.
customer_reviews.author: ame martin kazmer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt seem to be doing anything
customer_reviews.text: I got this air purifier for my room since it gets dusty easily and quickly. I've had it running everyday but honestly it doesn't seem to be doing anything. The room doesn't smell or feel any different. The room still gets pretty dusty and keep in mind its a very very small room. Even after a month I checked the filter and there's barely any dust on it. It doesn't make any noise on low setting, but its a freaking hurricane on high. I'll try moving it to a different spot and see if it changes anything. But for now it seems like a 100$ paperweight
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with cigarette smoke
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors chain smoke in there apartment and it comes through my walls and bathroom vent. As a non smoker I find it repulsive and all my clothes smelled like smoke. My skin literally smelled like smoke when I would go to work even after I showered. I bought one to start out with to see how it did and I ran it 24/7. Its rated at 200sf. But my studio is almost 400sf. It helped clear out the smell and I ended up buying a second one for my bathroom. Since I've had both going my place smells 100% better and smoke free! I'll update once I see how long the filter lasts with them running all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but very bright lights
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping with this in my bedroom for a few weeks and I seem to have fewer allergy problems when I sleep, even now that ragweed season is in full swing. The lowest setting is very quiet and almost inaudible so sound isn't any problem. The only complaint I have is that the LEDs are way too bright and uncovered, it's like having a night light in the room. I found a way to cover them enough but it would have been good if they came covered with some kind of solid lid.
customer_reviews.author: dilettante

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple, solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality design, nothing feels cheap or shabby. It's about the size of small trash can and so blends in right around the decor. It's not an obnoxious shape and has a simple and clean design. The filter cover simply pops of and has magnetic latching to hold it positively in place, a nice touch. Have two of them working in the master bedroom and the sound on level 2 of 3 is not distracting, sleep mode makes it whisper quite and kills the led lights. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jms

customer_reviews.title: 7 months and never a change filter notification!
customer_reviews.text: Started coughing and sneezing quite a bit in my little office space where this unit is running. Checked the top panel, and saw the only light on was the ON/OFF. Opened the front panel and saw a fully dirty filter! Bought this unit August of 2018, and this is the original filter. We have a LeVoit in another larger room, and it lights up every 30-45 days, because the filter needs replacing. Shame on me for not setting a reminder on my phone for at least 30 days to check the filter on this.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Dave

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect..would benefit from a DC Motor
customer_reviews.text: Diminutive size makes it appealing for smaller sized rooms. But... in a small room YOU will be closer to the unit, making fan noise more of a concern. If you're sensitive to noise you may be a bit disappointed even on the lowest setting. On other settings I don't even want to be in the room. I ended up giving it away and opting for another unit (Invisiclean Claro) which had a DC Motor. The benefits of DC motors are: less than half as noisy, MUCH longer lasting fan motor, and use about 80% less electricity. It's like going from incandescent bulbs to efficient LED. If this company made them with a DC motor I'd buy a few of them.
customer_reviews.author: webbie-20

customer_reviews.title: Great for family with dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that we love, but sheds a lot. We like her to sleep in our daughter's bedroom, but have started noticing a slight dog smell to the room. So I was excited to try this out. The air purifier is super light weight, and easy to use. It has a great sleep setting that allows for a more quiet fan and timer. It does not disturb my daughter's sleeping at all. After a couple days we already notice the smell is barely there, if at all! Just remember to take off the plastic to the filter first! Before turning the filter on.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa D

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: My gf basically spends her life sneezing and blowing her nose. She's allergic to life, plus we have a cat. Since adding this to our bedroom, she says there has been a noticeable difference and I've noticed she's not sneezing nearly as much when we're hanging out at the house. On the highest setting it also doubles as a white noise machine for sleeping, so that's an added bonus. Looks nice, easy to replace the filter and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: IKDC

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly of plastic
customer_reviews.text: The idea is to get rid of smells, but this unit smells like plastic, adding to the problem more than taking away. I left it sitting out for 6 months, and even after sitting out for 6 months it still smells, and it's too late to return it. Great design, love the idea of it, looks good, but...
customer_reviews.author: catalyst4change

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet
customer_reviews.text: I've been running it for 24 hrs and it still has a plastic smell coming out of it. It's pretty quiet on low but emits a kind of high hiss. Not suitable for a light sleeper as myself, which is really unfortunate since that's when I get the most congested. The filter looks hefty enough to do some work.
customer_reviews.author: Suza

customer_reviews.title: DEAD ON ARRIVAL
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if these positive reviews are fake or I’m just unlucky, but my unit didn’t work as soon as it was out of the box. I followed the instructions and for some reason the purifier keeps flashing and the fan keeps stuttering. It also started to smell, so I unplugged it just in case. I will return this for a refund right away. I haven’t even owned this product for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Okay

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year, then abruptly died (with an almost-new filter installed, so it wasn't strained). Worked beautifully for the year, but expensive if it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: Way too underpowered and barely moves any air. It is indeed very quiet on low and medium power, but that's because it's barely doing anything. The small lights on top shine annoyingly at night, so you have to put the air purifier into "sleep mode" to turn them off, which means the unit isn't doing a thing overnight when you most need it if used in the bedroom. Why there isn't a button to just turn off the lights while leaving the machine on the desired setting is beyond me. I returned this air purifier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: Helped so much during wildfire smoke .
customer_reviews.text: Purchased PureZone 3-in-1 from Amazon Sept 3, 2020. Delivered Sept 6. The air purifier arrived just after the smoke from fires in Oregon and Washington was reaching our upper northwest Washington area. The difference in the air quality in our bedroom was very noticeable. We were waking up congested and coughing before the unit, and after, we were not. So - I can only attribute that to the air purifier. It also has collected a surprising amount of dust in the month we've had it. We are very pleased with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: T. Booth

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, I received a used one/open box even though I paid for a brand new one. But I reported it to Amazon and they got me a replacement right away. Thumbs up to that! And when I got the new one, we love it! It really cleans the air in our house which helps reduce our allergy symptoms specially during spring season. It also has UV light which is PERFECT specially now during the pandemic. We got this Air Purifier last year, August 2019, and it is October 2020 now, it is still working perfectly. It is also easy to find replacement filters for it here in Amazon. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JLei03

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at my doctors office and liked the fact that it wasn’t noisy, I’m sensitive to noise. Plus the good old fashion proven HEPA filter is where it’s at! I don’t have to remove anything and wash it and let it dry for 24 to 48 hours like other non-HEPA filter systems. I highly recommend it and it has a sleep mode so you can turn off the blue lights for nightime. It has a gentle hum that is calming and actually blocks out some of the street noise. I ordered extra filters ahead of time and can simply pop them in no problem when needed. Ease of use, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Allergies/Asthma
customer_reviews.text: I have extreme allergies, along with asthma. I purchase an air purifier from Honeywell a couple of years ago, it worked OK, yet I still had issues with my breathing. This Fall I noticed I was having a lot more wheezing than normal. I went on line to see what other products were available. I decided on your product & ordered 2 through Amazon. I have been using the purifiers for 5 days & have had no issues with seasonal allergic reactions or symptoms of asthma. I have/am recommending your product to everyone I know that has pulmonary issues.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde W. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: A good defense against the Covid Virus
customer_reviews.text: My Wife & I decided that these Air Purifiers with the Ultra Violate light were a good defense against Covid. After reading that the Covid Virus could linger in the air for upto 2 days we decided that we needed one of these units in each of our major rooms. Just recently we added one for the basement which makes for a total of 3. These units are very quiet. Since we run each unit numerous times during the day, we've also purchased refills. Our first purchase was over 3 months ago and I'm about to do the first filter replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Sears

customer_reviews.title: this is the best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: I just about another one! As a smoker, this is the best I've used so far. The purifier has significantly cleaned up the air in my house and the machine looks good too. It's not too big, where it would stick out and it's not too small where you don't know if it's doing it's job. I also like that it's not too expensive. This has a one piece filter system so I don't have to worry about replacing different filter layers and it'll let you know when you need to replace it. Very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work That Well
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a few months ago and when I first set it up in my bedroom to get rid of pet smell, it was seeming to not make any difference at all. I then started to put it all the way to the highest setting it would go to make sure that it actually pulled some air in but it is massively under-effective for my very small room, also when you have it on the highest setting it is super loud as well. Maybe I got a defective one because others seem happy with it, but honestly, I would choose a different air filter if I could go back and change my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: This is my second purchase of this filter, because I liked the first one so much.
customer_reviews.text: I ruined the first one by introducing it to a construction zone and the fine cement dust from the grinding of cement left it caked with almost an inch of cement dust. I tried to clean it out but realized the cement dust was just to fine to remove all of it. So, I looked to replace it and bought the same model that I had before. This new one is in a safe environment. The high speed is a bit more noisy than it I think it should be, but it's manageable.
customer_reviews.author: From the mind of Bob

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have horrible allergies and live in a location with heavy dust and pollen. It works great for getting rid of unwanted dust in a room. I cant say I have noticed a significant improvement for odors. I have a two bedroom apartment and it works well in each room including the living room. You can hear it when you put it on level two and three but I normally use it before bed. Also I do notice my throat seems a little dry after each use especially if I sleep with it on. I am going to combine it with use of my humidifier and hopefully it should even out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Zone 3 in 1 Air Purifier is a life changer.
customer_reviews.text: Our world has changed forever since the pandemic COVID-19 took over. Since we are in quarantine I needed to take action. Along with steaming the floors and sanitizing my home I felt it wasn’t enough. Upon receiving our Pure zone air purifier, I have to say this is the best performing air purifier I’ve ever had! My family felt a big difference in the air, we feel and breathe better. This design is sleek and light weight. I appreciate the automatic shut off, which I can set at 2hr, 4hr or in 8hr. I highly recommend this air purifier to anybody sensitive to dust, smoke , germs and viruses in other words ... to everybody!
customer_reviews.author: EmmH

customer_reviews.title: Works so well!
customer_reviews.text: Our infant son’s room is on the lower floor which is technically underground and has a door that is opposite a neighbor’s apartment. This means that we often get a musty smell from being underground and very strong odors - and probably toxic fumes - from the neighbor’s cigarettes. We tried other filters, but your 3-in-1 true HEPA air purifier was the only one that made a real difference. (Ionizer worked half as well and left a horrible/frightening ozone odor in the room). Now we feel secure that our son is breathing air that is odor free and filtered as clean as possible. Thank you for such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: Edit: this filter is useless on low and medium, but high is too loud for comfort for our daughter and for us adults. It’s now collecting dust instead of filtering it, as we barely use it. I should’ve Just bought another omega. It’s perfect filtering and white noise. The filter replacements are a bit pricey, which is why we tried this one. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Uprainier

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & sounds like trash!
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the UV light. I dislike the intermittent "grinding" sound on fan speed mode 3. (Aka Highest speed.)
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Seems to get the job done. I plan to purchase a 2nd.
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with seasonal allergies and have a moisture issue in my home, so I thought an air purifier/dehumidifier might help. I really like how quiet it is and how easy it is to use. I just leave it on in my bedroom and have noticed I'm rubbing my eyes a lot less. I ended up getting my air ducts professionally cleaned, as well, so I'm hoping that long-term, these things will help the air quality in my home. I haven't noticed anything in terms of odor elimination, as that was never an issue for me. I plan to purchase another one to keep in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: First purifier works great, second (and recent) is meh
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for a gift. I love the first purifier I bought for myself. By the way, I have had my purifier for over 6+ and can still say I love it. The highest level is a bit loud but a consistent medium-low is very quiet. There is still dust around the area, however by looking at the first barrier filter, it captures a lot of dust! Unfortunately the second purifier I bought was missing some filters and instructions. My recipient was grateful to receive it so didn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for pet dander
customer_reviews.text: My husband is allergic to cat dander and starting sneezing a few weeks after we adopted a shelter kitty. He started with a daily antihistamine but that seemed to have minimal effect. After reading reviews, I decided to try this purifier even though I was skeptical of advertised effectiveness. But to my surprise, it has done wonders; he rarely sneezes nor needs facial tissues since we've started running this purifier. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This air purifier is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I literally have one of these in every bedroom. This is the perfect quiet air purifier for a small to medium-sized bedroom. Night mode and sleep function are okay, but the lowest speed, while quiet, doesn't really provide enough air circulation and UVC disinfection for my peace of mind, so I leave it on medium at night with a towel over the LED indicators to darken the room. Works just fine that way. So far, all three of mine have been working perfectly since March! Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: okiegal

customer_reviews.title: It’s fantastic, can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe it. As long as you watch the filter and clean it or change it sometimes, it was in a smoking room and each night I turned it on in the smelly smoky living room, by morning there’s no trace or smokers. I can’t imagine what it does beyond for allergies etc. Such a small item and yet very efficient in my 65 square meter two bedrooms apartment in New York City. I have had it for over a year now, I just bought 4 extra filters and only used two so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Pure junk...
customer_reviews.text: ...only "enriching" the manufacturer/seller. Completely ineffective. At the medium setting airflow does not seem to be anything more than at the lowest setting and in either setting this filter is barely moving any air. At the highest setting you get good airflow but it is very noisy. However, I set this up near my equipment to capture household dust out of the air and have seen absolutely zero reduction in dust accumulation so even at the highest setting this filter is doing nothing. I have beaten myself up because I waited a while after receiving the unit to set it up and in doing so blew the return window. Bottom line - this unit is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Draxiis Riixard

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Better Air Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'd recently moved into a new townhouse and was complaining about the smell being emitted from the exposed framing boards in my basement. A friend of mine turned me onto this as she uses it in her office which is an old barn building and now and then her clients complain about a musty smell. I've kept this running almost non-stop for the past three months and the horrible smell is nearly gone! My sour red eyes and headaches are almost in check also. I'd highly recommend this air filter to anyone with allergies and unusual or nasty natural smells in your home or office!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t notice any difference in air quality or smell
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice any difference in air quality or smell. Plugged it in as soon as I unpackaged it and left it running nonstop for over 2 months to really test it and see if any difference in the air quality. After 2 months, No noise yet, but filter looks clogged already. And air quality feels the same. Never changed/necer noticed any difference. It Does not let you know when filter needs replacing so I could’ve been running it this whole time and the filter has not been working. Since it’s too late for me to return, maybe I will get a replacement filter and give it another shot. But most likely will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Rio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use purifier and UVC lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Good compact size for purifying air up to 200sq feet!!! We love that it has a UVC lamp built in as well since we both work in a hospital and have kids at home! It has a modern look that is nice so I don’t have to put it in a closet when we have people over (when our doors are back open after this coronavirus pandemic!). It is very easy to use!! You just remove from the box, take the filter out of the plastic, and then insert filter. Good to go! Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: My Third Pur Purifier
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this humidifier because I loved my first one so much, that I purchased another for another room and then another! With the wildfires in my area recently, I wanted assurance that my air was fresh and clean, so I purchased my last one for my kitchen. It is modern looking, compact enough that it does to take up a lot of space and has the assurance of 3 way filtration. Filters are easy to remove and switch out. It has 3 speeds, and a timer for 3 time slot choices. 3 speeds and you can turn of the UV if you choose so. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Decea

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, reduces exposure to germs and viruses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this purifier to replace a 7 year old table top purifier. Main things I were looking for was quiet operation, ability to sanitize air passing thru the unit, and reasonable cost for replacement filters. On the two lowest fan speeds this unit is very quiet. During the daytime I use the unit on medium or high speed. At night it is run at low speed and never interferes with sleep. The UV-C lamp provides an extra level of sanitizing the air for germs and viruses. It can be turned on or off as desired. A timer function is also available. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two purifiers a couple months ago. I have one purifier in each bedroom and it is much less dusty after the first use. It also circulates the air very well and is extremely quiet on the first and second fan settings. The sleep mode turns off the lights and runs on the lowest setting which is great, as I like to sleep in the dark. I have stopped waking up with an stuffy nose after using this purifier. I don’t have any negative feedback after using these machines for a couple of months. I recommend this product. In addition, the price of the machine and the additional filters make this purifier a reasonably affordable machine on the long-run.
customer_reviews.author: K.Z

customer_reviews.title: 5th one purchased
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 in our home, 1 in my wife's office and I have just purchased this latest one for my office. Given the pandemic, the PureZone Air Purifier's ability to kill viruses gives us incredible peace of mind. We love how quiet it is and feel that it's sleek design is attractive, and adds, rather than detracts, from our home and office spaces. PureZone Air Purifier has made all the difference in the life of our two sons who have allergies, one who has asthma. It has truly improved their quality of life. I am currently considering adding one to each of my employee's offices as well. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: knick knack

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: More than we could have wished for. A great air purifier . Not to large , it sits on her dorm desk. We purchased it for our daughter’s college dorm room. Originally for a roommate that used a Juul in their room. the unit worked great, our daughter is using it this semester with just normal air conditions , It keeps a room fresh which is a fabulous plus when windows are never opened. The only setting which is a tad loud is the last setting but it is never needed. It was a life saver ! GREAT .
customer_reviews.author: mike p

customer_reviews.title: its a small unit that succeeds mostly
customer_reviews.text: It works at slightly decreasing odor in an average sized room in an american house (100-140 sq ft). I don't know if it's placebo but after leaving this thing on for several hours, my air feels very pure. idk it's not like you can easily see or measure how effective these kinds of devices are. maybe burn incense for a few minutes and see how long before you can't smell them? I really like the sleep features it offers, the time increments are 2-4-8hrs and i think thats perfect. there's just so many filters packed into this thing i couldnt pass it up!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Helped us breathe during the WA/OR/MT fires
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air purifier because it was getting ridiculous trying to breathe clean air up here in Northeast Washington earlier this month with all the wildfires. We live in an area where the outside air was rated hazardous for breathing for 5 days in a row! It was getting yucky inside as well, so I ordered this with prime shipping, took it out of the box, took two seconds to set up, turned it on, and within half an hour the inside air was significantly better. By the evening, it was perfect. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ursus

customer_reviews.title: Help Eliminating Odors
customer_reviews.text: This was our 2nd Purifier. We like them so far. It makes the air smell cleaner and purer particularly during this time with the wild fire surrounding us. It is too hot to keep all the windows closed so we have to turn on the Air Purifier with windows open. It absolutely make the air smell better. We will recommend it to our friends. One thing that we don't like is when we turn it on at sleep, the blue light is a bite annoying. We sometimes have to cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: Angel W

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used with Smart power socket and no way of telling if uv bulb is working
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, it has one major flaw that has me replacing it after a half year. There is no way to get it on a schedule. I was really hoping I could use it with a smart power socket and automatically run it on a schedule, unfortunately you always have to press buttons after it power up to run it. Another flaw is, there is no way of telling if the bulb is still working. After six months I am left wondering does it still work? Is it burnt out?.... frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was suggested to purchase this due to allergies. I really like this model, product has the perfect amount of white noise and works great in the bedroom for a comfortable nights sleep. The lights on the unit are super bright and that is the only issue we have, however that was an easy fix with a tiny square of electrical tape over the light. I don't care about looks as no one should be that involved in my house or equipment lol
customer_reviews.author: Victory Rider

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using the PureZone 3-in-1 True HEPA Air Purifier in the bedroom for about two weeks and are very happy with it. There was a noticeable improvement in air quality over our older Vornado filter. I like how easy it is to see, clean, and replace the filter. The controls are also easy to use in the dark without glasses. We use the filter as a white noise generator while we sleep and leave it on high all night. The two lowest fan speeds were actually too low, but the high setting is perfect. I plan on vacuuming the filter monthly, the cover comes off easily and the filter is right there.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Price is good but...
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of creating white noise for a better sleeping experience, but the idea that this little machine ( not a tower ) can effectively cleanse the air and neutralize odors seems to be limited to a small room ( not much bigger than 10 x 11 ft. ). The larger room of 15 x 12 feet in my house seems to be too large for it to sufficiently clean the air. The price is excellent and would recommend it for a small room only.
customer_reviews.author: john f sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Pure Joy
customer_reviews.text: The air purifier seems to work really well. Love that I can ajust fan speeds and the lowest setting is great for the night time. So far very happy with this device and the UV light is a great advantage, although don't really know its effect on any viruses. But this type of light is generally shown to be effective...so will see.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to eliminate cigarette smoke which it did very effectively and efficiently. The room now smell very fresh wich i really appreciate since i have 2 babies and now i don't worry that the smoke particles are going out of smoking room and around the house and eventually getting into their lungs. I sometimes use it in the kitchen if i am cooking smelly food and it is also very good at eliminating smells.
customer_reviews.author: Lara M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Great purifier. Very quiet. Wish it had a 12 hour auto off selection instead of the 2 or 4 hour. The 8 hour is a nice length for night. However, after running nightly for 5 months in my son's room for allergies, the on/off button has stopped working. We bought 2 at the same time and our second unit isn't used as often and the on/off still works, but curious as to how soon until that one stops too. Hopefully Pure has good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: rojepenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Purifier - Quiet
customer_reviews.text: My friend purchased the Model PEAIRPLG, and it was super quiet and worked very well to circulate the stuffiness in the office. It also worked well at clearing any odors caused by perfume and the smell from air vents. The unit that I purchased had a factory smell that lasted 3 weeks long. I almost returned it, but the smell went away eventually. This was the only "con" for this product. I like the automatic shutoff timer regulated for 2, 4 or 8 hours of use. Also, the easy method of replacing the filter. We recently painted the walls inside the house, and this came in handy for air circulation. So I would give this 4-1/2 stars out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Maelin

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Filter with Low Noise and Auto shut off features
customer_reviews.text: I love this air purifier. I have had it for about 3-4 months now and it works great. I do a lot of carpentry and the sawdust and woodworking materials negatively affects the air quality at home and at the shop. I bought this air purifier and I can feel the difference the very next day especially at the shop. It does a great job at cleaning the air and on low setting/ sleep mode, it is so quiet that I don't even notice that it is on. It has a sleep mode and auto shut off after 2/4/8 hours which come is very handy. I am very pleased with this product and am considering buying more around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less snot
customer_reviews.text: This has been a tremendous help to me. I am allergic to dust,dander, and pollen/trees etc We have a wood burning stove, a dog that sleeps with us and dust like everyone else. I am not blowing my nose nearly as much. I didn’t have to blow my nose the last two mornings which is shocking because it’s always the first thing I would do when I woke up in the morning. We use it in our bedroom. It’s quiet. Lights on it are a bit bright but easy to cover if you need to. It’s not a deal breaker for me and I like dark when I sleep. Best Black Friday money I spent on myself!
customer_reviews.author: CROI400

customer_reviews.title: Good air purifier
customer_reviews.text: Very good air purifier! It's the first I've owned, so I can't compare it to another brand. Nevertheless, I'm quite happy with the purchase. It arrived promptly. I found the exterior design to be quite attractive while maintaining a minimalist look and blending well with the background. The purifier was very easy to take apart and the HEPA filter very easy to access. Everything was very straightforward and intuitive. The three fan speeds are very useful, with the lowest one being barely audible. With that said, I recommend this air purifier.
customer_reviews.author: Lassokid

customer_reviews.title: It's cheaply made. Very generic. Should cost $45
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a fan with a box around it. The seal for the filter is foam that is wrapped around the filter. So assuming the filter really is HEPA the debris still get around the filter seal and back into the air. The vent for mine is covered in dust from this. Also it struggles to remove the dust from a room half the size as the square footage it claims to cover, the room isn't very dusty to begin with. I just like it clean. For as cheaply made as this is we should've paid about $45.00 instead of $100. I need another air purifier because this one doesn't do its job.
customer_reviews.author: T Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd thought of this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely as promised! The purifier has stopped my wife's bedtime coughing spells quickly and quietly, while also causing me to notice a cleaner taste and feel to the air I breathe whenever I enter the room. Easy to set up and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Vere

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The pure zone Hepa air purifier works extremely well. I was surprised at how small it is and how quiet it is as well. Set up was easy, and the finish looks good in any room. The option of selectable times for filtering is a nice addition. I originally bought it for a music studio to help with filtration during the pandemic, but currently use it in our bedroom. Versatile and small enough to place just about anywhere. One note is that low and medium are barely audible, but when the fan is on high, it is much louder.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Air
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the PureZone 3-in-1 True HEPA Air Purifier on June 28th so I have only owned it for about a week. So far it works great, I purchased mainly because of the amount of dust in my bedroom. I made sure all surfaces were clean before turning the purifier on and over the past week or so I have seen an amount of dust that is remarkably less than what I am used to. The unit is non intrusive in size and floorspace that it takes up. I love the timer and sleep feature which have made its use convenient so far. The air does seem "fresher" in general so I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April415

customer_reviews.title: Just over a year, now fan makes a terrible noise that makes unit unusable
customer_reviews.text: Bought just over a year ago. Pleased with the air cleaning. Though now it makes a terrible squeaking noise while operating. It’s so obnoxious that my son with allergies can no longer sleep with it running, even on the lowest setting. I’ve emailed customer support, so will update you when I get a resolution. Update on Feb 26, 2019 - very good experience with support. Went through their troubleshooting and sent in video of the noise. They quickly responded and sending out a new fan now. Updating to 4 stars. Great service. Would have liked to see fan last longer, so not 5 stars yet
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute.
customer_reviews.text: The air purifier is beautiful, and surprisingly small. The noise level during operation is optimal. I love how quiet it gets into sleep mode, and I appreciate that it is loud enough to serve as a white noise machine when it is run on high. A major factor for me in this purchase was the affordable cost of replacement air filters. If I could change anything about the design, it would be adding an option to dim the LED lights without turning it all the way down to sleep mode. I run it at high when I sleep, Because I like the white noise. I wish I could turn the lights down then too.
customer_reviews.author: SeethingGreen

customer_reviews.title: Small unit, small price, large air improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this machine is small enough and quiet! I have a “monster” air purifier that works but it’s huge and so noisy that I have to turn it off to have a conversation in person or on the phone—then I sometimes forget to turn the unit back on . This pure enrichment 3-in-1 is the right size for my bedroom, and its sleep setting that is quiet also eliminates the annoying blue light that disturbed my sleep with the other product. The filter replacement WON’T cost you about half the price of the original unit which is a drawback on many air purifiers; it’s very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectataions
customer_reviews.text: This PureZone HEPA air purifier collected more dust and particles than I expected. It's relatively small, and relatively quiet in the slowest mode. At first, I couldn't tell if it was collecting anything from the room or not. But when I removed the filter after 6 months and compared it to a new one, it was obvious it was doing its job well. I now have two of these in my apartment, and plan on getting a third. The filters last a solid 6 months and are easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: SAS008

customer_reviews.title: Seems adequate
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace our old honeywell air purifier when it died. Picked this based on good reviews and the sleek look. If running on low this is very quiet and relatively effective in my small living room. I wish it was a little better at odor elimination, particularly given it is also near my kitchen and some food smells just aren't so good when you can still smell them hours after the meal.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: My wife has very bad allergies. Her doctor told her she had the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has very bad allergies. Her doctor told her she had the worst dust allergy he had ever seen when looking at her allergy test results. One way to alleviate the symptoms was getting an air purifier. I am happy to say PureZone has helped out a lot. We put this in our bedroom. She sneezes a lot less, and her allergies seem to affect her less in the bedroom than elsewhere. We also haven't had to dusty nearly as much since getting this air purifier. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: Best product of it’s kind...Sleep mode A*++
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first one in January...and I have been so pleased with it that I ordered another one, which was delivered yesterday. I bought the first one for my daughters room and we noticed such an improvement in the air quality that we ordered one for ourselves as well. This is truly the best product of its kind I have ever owned... and I’ve had a lot of them. Two features I am especially happy about are the UV sanitizer light, and Sleep Mode which really does make the unit practically undetectable.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Cleans air for baby nurseries!
customer_reviews.text: On a scale of 1 to 5, I think this product is a 5! In late January 2019, my newborn grandson was born with some health problems that had my family worried. I bought this purifier in the hopes that it will help keep him safe and healthy. Each time the family went time the nursery, we could tell the difference in air quality. With two dogs and a cat, the air in our home isn't the most sterile. But this PureZone helps a lot! We are grateful for the design and ease-of-use for the purifier and look forward to it keeping our grandson healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Deffner

customer_reviews.title: Cannot smell cat litter box odors with this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my PureZone 3-in-1 True HEPA Air Purifier since September 2017 and have been running it continuously on “speed 2”. It is in the same room and directly next to two cat litter boxes, and it has made a tremendous and positive difference. I would highly recommend this filter, especially for odor and pet dander. I live in a small apartment and since I’ve had the filter, all of my guests comment that they cannot smell any evidence of cat odors, which is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: BetaDino

customer_reviews.title: This filter is not quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not quiet. Really wanted to use in bedroom 24/7 but when all in bed this filter is noisy even in ultra quiet night mode. I did everything manufacturer told me all was good for a few days and then just got annoyingly loud again. Can’t afford to change filter every few weeks. They are supposed to last 6 months. Other than noise level is well designed and works well to clean air.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Quiet, and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2018. I use it in our bedroom occasionally because I’m allergic to mold, and I think there’s mold in our bathroom. Our bedroom is bigger than 200 sq ft, and our bathroom is large, too. Still, this has been effective. The filter light never lit up. I ordered a new filter. After almost two and a half years of occasional use, you can see how dirty the filter is. The filter reset light still won’t work. But it cleans the air, and that’s the important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Effective filtration and odor control
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, purchased after Hurricane Harvey to counter the mold spores that were in the air. I have a mold allergy and I could tell that the filter was working. I have continued to use them to control other allergens. They are very effective at cleaning the air and eliminating odors. I am really impressed by how well they work. The filter is kind of loud on the highest setting, so I usually only turn it up to top speed if I am not at home or will be asleep. The UV-C filter makes the air smell very fresh, I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Long Frank

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Quiet, visually appealing, and helps with pet dander.
customer_reviews.text: We love our air filter! We have two dogs and live in Arizona so our house collects a lot of dust and dander which has caused my allergies to flare up, but since getting this filter my allergies have improved. The filter is visually appealing so it doesn't look bad sitting in the open and the 3 speeds are useful when we don't want too much noise, but even on the highest speed setting it isn't very loud. We also like that it doubles as a white noise machine at night while we sleep. We are very satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tgunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Purifier for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from amazon about 1 month ago, and keep it in a room that is approximately 200 sq ft or less. I am aware of the competition and own other brand name purifier devices currently on the market. This is the first pure enrichment product I've purchased and I am very happy with it as it works as intended, and is sold at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: KCDC8796

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable change
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the main lobby area of my therapy office. On high, the fan is noticeable but provides a pleasant white noise. I have been using the filter for about a week now. Yesterday a client commented that they had noticed a clear change in the quality and freshness of the air. When I entered the office this morning, I noticed a very obvious cleanliness in the air and the filter was off over the night. I will add more of these in my office to ensure clean air throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Brett M. Judd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first one of these in May 2019. About a month ago in early January 2020 it began to emit noise and rattling sounds (obviously far from ideal). I reached out to their customer service team for help and very quickly they determined that sending me a brand new system was the best fix. I received the replacement item within 4 days and did not have to pay a single cent. Super happy with the experience and product all together 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Will P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Super fast shipping.  Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product and am so happy that the shipping was so quick. This product is great. Works well. Was a relief to get it during the horrible smoke. Seller got it to me one day earlier than scheduled. Thank you so much!!! It works well, has a very quiet setting if someone is a light sleeper, and works quickly. Thanks again for shipping it so quickly during the bad air days. It came one day before scheduled, which was a wonderful relief.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Took pet smell out of basement!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this air purifier. We had 2 dogs and no issues with smells. We adopted a 3rd dog (Shiba Inu,) that has A LOT of fur\shedding and just an overall oilier coat and our downstairs just started stink like dog. I hated being down there. So we got this and within an hour or two the smell went away! We have a 1960's split level home so the finished basement area it pretty big, enough room for a tv area on one side and office\library on the other. We closed the door and put the filter in the middle of the room (against the wall) and works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn M

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my grandson who lives with me. He is in high school and active in sports, so his room often smells like dirty socks, and he also has significant seasonal allergies to deal with. Even after the first days use in his room, I could tell it has improved the air quality! Happy with the product thus far. Wish you made an even larger one to cover larger areas.... love the UV light, along with the other filters too. I work in health care and we often use UV light for cleaning in our surgery suites, so I know it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tableofblessing

customer_reviews.title: Breathing better with this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. I bought one for me and my husband’s bedroom. We have 2 small cats and we don’t know if it’s the pollen, the cat dander or just morning sniffles but we both always wake up sneezing continuously. No joke, the first day we got and used this bad boy, we both woke up without sneezing!!! This thing works for us. We bring it to any room in the house we’re in and we are both breathing better. We’re saving up to buy 1 or 2 more for the whole house. Thanks you guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Great for COVID-19 family member having trouble breathing
customer_reviews.text: Like many during this tough time dealing with COVID-19 and being rejected care at overcrowded hospitals- we self treated at home. M family member couldn’t breathe in much air, I totally forgot I had gotten this handy gadget and I have to tell you it has really aided in getting this family member to pull through and fight it out. They said the air feels cleaner and they feel like they can take it in easier. To hear that something can ease just some of their symptoms has prompted my to write this review. We are so grateful for this super powerful and effective machine. It does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: A Elias

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and well built
customer_reviews.text: When I first turned it on, i couldn't even hear it but could feel the air. My wife even said maybe it is broken. It's that quiet. It doesn't push much air at that speed, but at night its great not to have any background noise but still have something slowly cycling the air while not being disruptive. The medium speed becomes more noticeable and the high speed can definitely be heard. I use the higher speeds when i am not around to cycle the most air.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Don't make a promise you can't keep.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I originally gave 5 stars; however, I have never received a free filter the manufacturer promised to send to me in exchange for the review. The unit still seems to be working fine after 2 month in a bedroom 12'x12'. If you receive a free filter offer in the box asking for a review, just be aware you may never receive it. Very compact and nice looking unit. Works well too. Our house guest with cat allergy slept well with this.
customer_reviews.author: gumbyho

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months then it glitched majorly. The unit will pulse on and off continuously and it won't turn off unless it's unplugged--the power button won't work. Tried putting a new filter and no luck. Now it makes this high pitched squealing noise whenever the fan kicks when it pulses. I used it 4-5 times a week. Really disappointed with the quality. Contacted the seller regarding the claimed 5 year warranty. I'll update as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband said he is sleeping better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband - he snores terribly and therefore wakes ever few hours. He never sleeps well. I asked him about the filter - he feels he IS in fact sleeping better since I got it. He has allergies. It doesn't put any scent in the room but it does seem "crisper" in there - crisp is the best way I can put it. The sleep mode is pretty quiet - I only put it on 1 - it you put it on 2 or 3 it will be a bit louder but for me, it doesn't disturb me. Blue light from the buttons. Easy to work. This was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: What If?

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I already love this air purifier and received it just yesterday! It works well for my home office area which is bedroom sized. For context, I picked this purifier because I grew tired of carrying my larger purifier back and forth between rooms. Things that I like about it: It's very quiet The sleep feature The timer feature Some constructive criticism: Lack of sensor - my other purifier has an automatic mode that senses when to kick up or down and/or sleep Prefilter - I could foresee myself mistakenly tearing the prefilter when going to clean it. We'll see how that works in reality. Perhaps creating a framed piece that snaps onto the combo activated carbon/HEPA would be useful
customer_reviews.author: flayyven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Intial Impression
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased subject air purifier and within 24 hours of use of the product a difference has been noticed. It is routine for me to wake up in the morning with stuffiness and a scratchy throat. This morning not so. Others in the household that sleep without the product in their room did wake with these symptoms . Your product works. How reliable does your product work? Only time will answer that question but I am very satisfied with my purchase at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! I actually have two of these air cleaners and I highly recommend their use. I noticed many reviews reporting noise but that has not happened to me. The fan speed at 2 is perfect for daily use. Fan speed one is very week and in my opinion useless. Fan speed 3 does more work but with that you can expect the noise to raise ~15dB. The UV bulb has not gone out and filters last a very long time which is great. I have bought extra and they are fairly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the product
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the product. Doesn't move enough air on any speed setting, on the fastest setting is too loud to be used all the time. Filters for this unit are very thin. The fan inside is small and the product description says it moves air at 80 CFM; that's the size and air movement of a computer case fan and for that it uses 60 watts of power.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and looks great! I love all the features that it includes at such a great price. It looks really fancy and modern which is good for something you put out in your home. The air is noticeably cleaner and it really helps with the smell of my cats litter box. The litter box was the main reason I bought this. I live in a small apartment and my cat stinks it up daily. I’ve had it for a few days now and haven’t smelled her once. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, efficient and  affordable. REALLY DO THE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 several months ago and they have totally exceeded my expectations! With 3 dogs, 2 cats, asthma & sinus issues, I was looking to replace 4 of another (more expensive) brand with 2 Pure Enrichment Air Purifiers, then purchase 2 more if I liked them. Never had to buy 2 more! These totally do the job, dust, pet dander, pollen & animal smells....all gone! They run quietly and are easy to clean. Replacement filters are readily available and very economical. I would highly recommend this product !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: laf pa

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound of it in high as white noise. On fan speed 1 and 2 it is whisper quiet. I've been running it for 3 months non stop. I just now had to clean the outer filter that looks like a piece of felt. I feel we sneeze less so it's doing its job. It doesn't remove smells. For example, the hubby will cook bacon or cook with apple cider vinegar in the kitchen and it will waft to the bedroom. The purifier can't eliminate the smell in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Beane

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment PureZone 3-in-1 Air Purifier - True HEPA Filter & UV-C Sanitizer Cleans Air, Helps Alleviate Allergies, Removes Pet Hair, Smoke & More - For Home, Office & Bedroom
feature_bullets: 3-STAGE AIR PURIFICATION: Clean and sanitize your air from 99.97% of dust, pollen, pet dander, smoke, and household odors. Stage 1: Pre-filter; Stage 2: Activated carbon filter; Stage 3: True HEPA filter.
BUILT-IN UV-C LIGHT: Adds a deeper level of air sanitation by destroying illness-causing microorganisms
100% OZONE FREE: PureZone never uses ionizers or ozone generators to help keep you safe from lung-related illnesses.
ENERGY-EFFICIENT & EASY TO USE: Using touch-button technology, select between 3 automatic timer settings to save energy or run continuously after choosing one of 3 fan speeds.

WHAT YOU GET: 3-in-1 air purifier, 3-in-1 filter, UV-C light bulb and Pure Enrichment’s guaranteed 5-Year Warranty. Our customer support team provides daily quality service and peace of mind to millions worldwide all from a brand you can trust.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars7,526 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
